sourcing.instructions: Cerium (Ce): Available from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in rare earth metals.
steps: Cerium (Ce): Available from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in rare earth metals.
1. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine 80 g of cerium, 30 g of copper, 10 g of mercury, and 240 g of silicon.
